description: A representation of the Entity extracted from a PROV document. Each entity has a set of values.

entityGroup.title: A group of Entity extracted from a PROV document. They are grouped by the type of entity they represent.

id.title: Entity type IRI extracted from the PROV document

name.title: A machine readable name for the entity

comment.title: A human readable comment for the entity. For example: the description from the ontology
examples: Class that represents a variable used on a Question. This variable name must be present on the template and pattern of the question that uses it. Can have contraints in the form of a query (hasConstraint property) or a list of possible options (hasFixedOptions property).

view.title: Data Narrative view where the Entity must be. For example: questionVariable is in the  view
examples: Class that represents a variable used on a Question. This variable name must be present on the template and pattern of the question that uses it. Can have contraints in the form of a query (hasConstraint property) or a list of possible options (hasFixedOptions property).

entities.title: A list of entities grouped by the type of entity they represent

name.title: A human readable value of the Entity
examples: What is the effect size of ?Genotype on ?Region ?Brain Imaging Trait?

label.title: A human readable label for the value of the Entity
examples: What is the effect size of Genotype on Region Brain Imaging Trait?

comment.title: A human readable comment for the variable value
examples: Question that asks for the effect size of a genotype on a brain imaging trait.

value.title: The value of the variable value
